name: Glowbe
description:
Very short game (about 12 levels) I made in 1 day

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys

Up/W - Jump

AD/Left Right - Left and Right

Escape - Quit to menu

Reach the glowing white thing without falling or touching the spikes.

I've only been able to test the Windows and Web builds so sorry if there are any bugs on the Linux and Mac versions.




Simple platformer. See if you can complete all the levels without dying :)
